K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:111b-14: cho 'phrul de dag ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:111b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:111b-17: lha'i bu ded dpon 'di de lta bur ston pa las na 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:111b-18: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yang bsnyen bkur bgyis pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:111b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:111b-22: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:111b-24: lha'i bu ded dpon 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su smin par byas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:111b-26: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-0: bskal pa mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa @112a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-2: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-5: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-6: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-9: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can rnams bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gnas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-11: yid mi bde ba'i sgra 'ga' tsam yang med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams de yang rin po che sna bzhi gser dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-17: ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na 'jam zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-19: ngan song rnams dang bral la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-20: lha dang mi rnams kyis kun tu gang zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-21: yid la bsams pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang btung ba dag 'byor la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-22: bde ba tshad med pa dang ldan pas na de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-25: shes rab kyi snang ba thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-26: gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112a-28: tshig thams cad rab tu 'byed cing ston pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112b-0: mngon par shes pas rnam par @112b shes pa khong du chud pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112b-1: bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112b-2: sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112b-3: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la ji ltar rigs pa bzhin du chos kyi sman sbyor ba la mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112b-4: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112b-5: gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112b-6: rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i shes pa la mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112b-12: blo rgya mtsho'i rjes su zhugs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112b-18: shes rab la shin tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112b-19: thabs mtha' yas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112b-22: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas shin tu zhugs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112b-26: snyoms par 'jug pas rnam par rtse ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:112b-28: de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i gsung rab la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113a-1: kyi rgyal po gling bzhi'i dbang phyug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113a-2: rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113a-3: mi'i dbang por gyur pa lta bu zhig byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113a-4: de'i bu stong du tshang bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113a-5: de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113a-7: rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de yang btsun mo'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113a-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i sku tshe'i tshad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113a-9: mi dag gi tshe tshad ni lo dung phyur phrag bdun du gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113a-10: de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa bu stong dang lhan cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113a-11: btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu chos la dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113a-14: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo 'bum tshang bar thugs la dgongs pa bzhin du na bza' dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113a-19: bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113b-0: rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa 'khor dang bcas pas @113b rtag par rgyun du de bzhin gshegs pa de la mngon sum du nyin gcig mi 'chad par rang gi lag nas gus par phul zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113b-1: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos nyan pa la yang 'jug par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113b-3: btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas lo 'bum 'das nas kyang yang dang yang du sangs rgyas mthong zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113b-4: yang dang yang du de la chos nyan pas rjes su dran pa bzhi thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113b-6: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113b-7: chos rjes su dran pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113b-8: dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113b-9: sbyin pa dang ldan zhing byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113b-10: rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113b-11: de rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pas nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113b-12: chos yang dag par bgro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mthong ba dang bral bar ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113b-14: de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa bu dang bcas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113b-15: btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa de chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de ga la ba der song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:113b-16: de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas rjes su gdams pa mdzad par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114a-1: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa des 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114a-3: cho 'phrul de dag ma lags pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan ma mchis lags sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114a-4: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114a-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114a-7: cho 'phrul de dag ma yin pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan yang yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114a-10: sems dang sems las byung ba gzugs can ma yin pa rnams bshad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114a-11: sems dang sems las byung ba 'gags pa rnams bshad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114a-12: da ltar byung ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba mi gnas pa rnams smos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114a-13: ma skyes ma byung ba'i lam bshad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114a-14: rnam par thar pa'i sgo ro gcig pa rnams la yan lag gsum du smos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114a-15: mngon par rtogs pa gcig tu 'dus pa la bden pa bzhir yongs su brjod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114a-17: rnam pa med pa dang; 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub la yongs su sgrub par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114a-20: smon pa med pa'i chos rnams bshad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114b-0: phyin ci @114b log dang nyon mongs pas grub pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114b-2: dor ba med pa'i chos rnams la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114b-3: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114b-4: byas pa med pa'i chos rnams la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114b-5: 'byung ba med cing skad cig ma'i chos rnams la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114b-6: lus dang sems dben pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114b-8: rnam par g-yengs pa med pa'i chos rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114b-10: tshu rol med pa'i chos rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114b-12: bsal ba med pa'i chos rnams la thabs mkhas pa yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114b-14: rton pa med pa'i chos rnams la byams pa bsgom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114b-16: gzhig pa med pa'i chos rnams la snying rjes sbyor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114b-17: dga' ba med pa'i chos rnams la dga' ba mngon par sgrub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114b-18: gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la btang snyoms bsgom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114b-20: mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:114b-22: rnam par rig pa med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i rna ba mngon par sgrub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115a-3: rnam par bral ba'i chos rnams la pha rol gyi sems shes pa yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115a-4: sngon gyi mtha' dang bral ba'i chos rnams la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115a-8: brtson 'grus dang bral ba'i chos rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'thob pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115a-9: gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115a-11: 'gag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang dag pa'i spong ba bsgom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115a-12: dbang po med pa'i chos rnams la dbang po bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115a-14: nyam chung ba'i chos rnams la stobs yongs su brjod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115a-15: nye bar zhi ba'i chos rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag bshad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115a-16: khyad par med pa'i chos rnams la lam smos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115a-17: zhi ba'i mthar song ba'i chos rnams la zhi gnas bskyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115a-18: rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115a-19: rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mya ngan las 'das par smon pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115a-20: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115a-21: bu stong po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-0: btsun mo'i tshogs @115b de dag la cho 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de nyid las brtsams te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-1: de lta de ltar chos bstan pa dang srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-2: rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-3: de'i bu stong gis ni chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-4: de dag gis bzod pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-5: rang gi spobs pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-6: ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-7: lhun po'i rgyal po mdzes pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-8: de bzhin dge 'dun dbus na ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-9: chos kyi rgyal po rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-10: ji ltar nyi ma 'char ba yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-11: mun pa thams cad sel ba ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-12: de bzhin sangs rgyas mdzod spu yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-13: sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-14: ji ltar zla ba nya ba yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-15: zla ba yongs rdzogs lhang nge ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-16: sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-17: 'jig rten mgon yang lhang nge lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-18: ji ltar me tog padma ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-19: chab kyi nang du mi gos ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-20: de bzhin 'jig rten mgon po yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-21: 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-22: ji ltar seng ge ri dvags rgyal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-23: nags na sgra skad sgrogs pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:115b-24: de bzhin skyes bu seng ge yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-2: mchis sam yang na ma mchis dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-3: mchis dang ma mchis thams cad dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-4: mthar lta ba la rnam 'das pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-5: nges par seng ge sgra zhes bgyi; ;skye ba'am yang na 'jig pa'ang rung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-6: de dag mtshan mar bstan 'dzin cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-7: mi skye 'gag pa ma mchis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-8: nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-9: pha rol dang ni tshu rol dag; de dag rnam par rtog par bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-10: chos rnams kun la mi gnas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-11: nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-12: kun nas nyon mongs rnams byang ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-13: de gnyis mtshan nyid ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-14: shin tu dri ma ma mchis chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-15: nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-16: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-17: yongs su rtog las byung ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-18: rtog bral rnam rtog ma mchis pa; ;nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-20: de dag lam du gzhug pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-21: chos rnams shin tu gsog lags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-22: nges pa seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi; ;skye dang 'chi dang 'khor ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-23: phyin ci log las byung ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-24: mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med don //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-25: nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-26: lta dang dmigs pa gnas lags te; ;de dag gis ni 'jig rten 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-27: chos rnams stong par rab bshad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116a-28: nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116b-0: gang dag ji snyed @116b bstan mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116b-1: de dag thams cad bshad pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116b-2: nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116b-3: sems ni mnyam pa nyid slad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:116b-4: rjes su mthun dang mi mthun pa'i //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:121a-23: gang dag stong chen sems can de dag kun //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:144b-10: sems can thams cad kyi sems la nges par sems pas rang gi sems la nges par sems pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145a-0: las byas pa chud mi za bas chud mi za ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams @145a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145a-2: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas tha dad med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145a-3: dgra thams cad nges par bcom pas dpa' ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145a-4: skal pa mnyam pa'i skye bo dang mthun par 'jug pas ma 'dres pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145a-6: sdang ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145a-7: rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145a-10: bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba la mchog tu dga' bas dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145a-12: mchog tu dga' ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145a-16: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan par byed pas rgyan gyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no; ;mnyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145a-17: mi mnyam pa'i gnyen por gyur pas zil gyis mi non pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145a-18: skye bo mkhas shing mdzangs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pas ngan pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145b-0: tshul bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa rnams shin tu nges par brtags pas mi rtsi @145b ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145b-1: khur blangs pa nyams su lon pas skyes bu dam pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145b-2: brtson 'grus brtan pos phyir mi ldog pas khyad par du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145b-3: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par sdud pas chos spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145b-4: sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pas byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no; ;dkon mchog gsum 'dri bar mi byed pas dkon mchog gi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145b-5: sdud pa dang yongs su gcod pas shes rab dang thabs kyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145b-7: spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145b-8: de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145b-9: 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de ni legs par smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145b-10: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag spyod pa de dang ma bral ba de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:145b-11: de nyid kyis lung bstan pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-4: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-6: gang gi tshe nga spyod pa de dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-7: nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-8: der ngas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-10: gang spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de lta bu de dag rab tu 'byed par byed pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-14: mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni ci lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-15: 'jug pa gang gis ni byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-18: mi skye ba zhes bya ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-19: gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i mu'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig bla dvags yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-20: de ni sngon byung bar gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-21: phyis ma byung bar gyur pa ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-22: de ni gzod ma nas ma byung ba nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-23: de ni sngon srid par gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-24: phyis mi srid par gyur pa ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-25: de ni gzod ma nas mi srid pa nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-26: de ni sngon skyes par gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146a-27: phyis ma skyes par gyur pa ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-0: de ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid yin @146b no; ;de ni sngon mngon par 'dus byas pa yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-1: phyis mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-2: de ni gzod ma nas mngon par 'dus ma byas pa nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-3: de ni sngon yod par gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-4: phyis med par gyur pa ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-5: de ni gzod ma nas 'gyur ba med pa nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-6: de ni sngon gang zag tu bgrang bar gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-7: phyis gang zag tu mi bgrang bar gyur pa ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-8: de ni gzod ma nas stong pa nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-9: de ni sngon mtshan mar bgrang bar gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-10: phyis mtshan mar mi bgrang bar gyur pa ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-11: de ni gzod ma nas mtshan ma med pa nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-12: gang gis de ltar rjes su rtogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-14: 'jig pa la mngon par zhen pa med par rtogs pa de ni mi skye ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-15: de la bzod pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-16: de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-17: de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du zhing thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-18: de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du slob pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-20: rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-21: de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-22: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-23: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-24: sangs rgyas thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:146b-25: de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-1: la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-2: bzod pa de yang skad cig pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-3: gang gis skad cig pa yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-4: skad cig pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-5: stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-6: mtshan ma med pa ni mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-7: ji ltar stong pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-8: mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-9: mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de ni de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-10: gzugs kyang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-11: ji ltar stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-12: mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-16: rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-17: ji ltar stong pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-18: mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-19: mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-20: chos thams cad kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-21: ji ltar stong pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-22: mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-23: mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147a-24: skye mched thams cad kyang skye mched rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-0: skad cig pa gang yin pa de ni ya ma rla yin @147b no; ;ya ma rla gang yin pa de ni gsog yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-1: gsog gang yin pa de ni gso ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-2: gso ba gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags med pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-3: 'dod chags med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-4: 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid med pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-5: ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-6: de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-11: chos thams cad la de ltar bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-12: bzod pa de yang bzod pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-13: de ltar mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lung bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-14: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-15: bzod pa de yang dmigs pas rab tu phye ba ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-16: de la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-18: bzod pa gnyi gar dmigs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-19: de ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-22: gso ba dang; gang zag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-23: bzod pa gnyi gar dmigs na de ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-24: de la dmigs pa med pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-26: bzod pa gnyi gar mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:147b-31: bzod pa gnyi gar mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148a-3: skye mched rnams kyi chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148a-4: ngo bo nyid gtan med pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148a-5: ngo bo nyid gtan med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148a-7: bzod pa de la gnyis su rjes su rtog par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148a-9: bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par spyod pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148a-10: bzod pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148a-11: 'jig rten 'di snang ba chen pos kyang khyab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148a-12: sil snyan brgya stong yang ma dkrol bar sgra 'khrol bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148a-13: me tog gi char pa dag kyang rab tu bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148a-14: srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148a-15: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148a-16: byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri drug stong gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148a-17: chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148a-18: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148a-19: rgyal po'i pho brang padma can du zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu yang kun tu snang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-0: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das @148b 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-1: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-2: chos nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-3: kha dog sna tshogs kha dog 'bum phrag du ma 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-10: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-11: de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-12: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-13: nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi 'od kyang zil gyis mnan nas yang phyir log ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-14: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-16: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-17: chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-18: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-19: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-20: thub pa ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-21: mi mnyam gzi brjid mnga' ba khyod la zhu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-22: 'od kyi bkod pa mdzad pa khyod la zhu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-23: rab rib nyon mongs spong ba khyod la zhu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:148b-24: bde gshegs ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-0: pha rol tshogs rnams 'joms pa khyod @149a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-1: la zhu; ;bdud dpung pham par mdzad pa khyod la zhu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-2: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa khyod la zhu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-3: rgyal ba ci slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-4: sum cu rtsa gnyis yon tan mtshan brgyan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-5: bde gshegs rab dga' 'dzum pa mdzad pa po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-6: gzugs kyi dam pa mnga' ba khyod la zhu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-7: bcom ldan ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-8: mkhyen pa mtha' yas yon tan ston pa po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-9: ye shes 'byung gnas 'gro ba shes mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-10: ye shes ljon shing mkhyen pa mchog la zhu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-11: 'jig rten gsum grags grags pa mtha' yas pa; ;gsum rig dri gsum mtha' mar mdzad pa po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-12: 'jig rten gsum rig rnam thar gsum mthar byon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-13: ci yi slad du 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-14: sman pa dam pa skye rga mthar mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-15: bcom ldan zhabs la dri mchog 'khor lo mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-16: sred med sras po rdo rje mkhregs pa po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-17: thub pa 'dzum mdzad sbyor ba bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-18: gang gis spyod pa de ni rnam sbyangs sam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-19: gang 'dir bzod pa de dag yongs rdzogs sam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-20: gang sems sangs rgyas yon tan nges gyur tam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-21: ci yi slad du thub chen 'dzum pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-22: bde gshegs bla med rgyu zhig mi mnga' bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-23: bcom ldan 'dren pa 'dzum pa mi ston pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-004:149a-24: de thos sems can glo ba rangs 'gyur gyi //
